speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: SCENE III. The Duke of Albany's palace.

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Enter GONERIL, and OSWALD, her steward

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Did my father strike my gentleman for chiding of his fool?

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: Yes, madam.

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: By day and night he wrongs me; every hour

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: He flashes into one gross crime or other,

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: That sets us all at odds: I'll not endure it:

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: His knights grow riotous, and himself upbraids us

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: On every trifle. When he returns from hunting,

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: I will not speak with him; say I am sick:

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: If you come slack of former services,

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: You shall do well; the fault of it I'll answer.

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: He's coming, madam; I hear him.

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: Horns within

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Put on what weary negligence you please,

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: You and your fellows; I'll have it come to question:

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: If he dislike it, let him to our sister,

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Whose mind and mine, I know, in that are one,

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Not to be over-ruled. Idle old man,

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: That still would manage those authorities

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: That he hath given away! Now, by my life,

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Old fools are babes again; and must be used

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: With cheques as flatteries,--when they are seen abused.

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Remember what I tell you.

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: Well, madam.

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: And let his knights have colder looks among you;

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: What grows of it, no matter; advise your fellows so:

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: I would breed from hence occasions, and I shall,

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: That I may speak: I'll write straight to my sister,

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: To hold my very course. Prepare for dinner.

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Exeunt
